channel.title: Push notifications not working in Safari
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
Having an issue where Redash will never do push notifications in Safari. Works in Firefox on the same computer / same account.
I'm thinking it's because possibly I first used Firefox and then switched to Safari?
Is there a way to force redash to re-ask for push notification permission?
This is OS X Big Sur
I already verified that the installed web site has permissions to allow push notifications.
### Technical details:
* Redash Version: v9 Beta * Browser/OS: Safari 14.1.1 * How did you install Redash: docker
